Similarly, Tamil Nadu's DMK government expanded its women's welfare scheme and announced additional payments, also facing accusations of electoral timing.

description: Veteran cornerback Darius Slay, technically on the Buffalo Bills roster, sparked widespread confusion by attending the Philadelphia Eagles’ playoff game against the San Francisco 49ers. After a stint with the Steelers and being claimed by the Bills, Slay reportedly considered retirement during 2025 season. His presence in Philadelphia has fueled widespread speculation about his future and lingering ties to his former team, where he won a Super Bowl.

description: A junior hockey coach in Gurgaon has been arrested. He is accused of raping a minor student four months ago. The student, a Class 12 player, reported the incident after becoming pregnant. She suffered a miscarriage. The coach is in police custody for questioning. Investigations are ongoing.

description: Mohammad Rizwan became the first overseas player in the BBL to be retired out after struggling to accelerate the scoring for Melbourne Renegades. Rizwan's BBL campaign has been below expectations with 167 runs in eight matches.

He expertly navigated a challenging chase, prioritizing strike rotation and protecting his partners before unleashing his finishing skills in the final overs. Chopra lauded Rahul's maturity and game awareness, comparing his calm demeanor to MS Dhoni's.

Badoni's all-round abilities and leadership experience also contributed to his selection.

description: Every 40 seconds, a stroke strikes, altering lives instantly.  Recognizing B.E.F.A.S.T. warning signs – Balance, Eyes, Face, Arm, Speech, and Time – is crucial.  High blood pressure, atherosclerosis, and lifestyle choices are key causes.  Prompt medical attention, clot-busting drugs, or clot removal can save lives and prevent lasting damage. Prevention through healthy habits is paramount.

'We'll hit them ...': Trump on Iran's threat to target US bases; over 500 killed in protests
description: US President Donald Trump stated Washington is monitoring Iran's deadly protests and considering military retaliation, warning of unprecedented strikes if attacked. Iran's President accused the US and Israel of fomenting unrest, while the UN urged an end to the violent crackdown and restoration of internet access. Activists report over 544 deaths and thousands detained amid escalating violence.

title: Vanessa and Natalia Bryant’s combined net worth after Kobe Bryant
description: Vanessa and Natalia Bryant, following the tragic loss of Kobe Bryant, have amassed a combined net worth of $606 million. Vanessa manages the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation and benefits from brand deals and business ventures. Natalia, a budding model, contributes to her $6 million net worth through her career and inheritance.

title: 'You can't align what you can't control': Microsoft AI boss warns rivals
description: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman urges the industry to prioritize containment over alignment in AI development, warning against pursuing superintelligence without first ensuring control. He advocates for a "Humanist Superintelligence" approach, focusing on practical applications like medical AI and clean energy, to maintain human oversight and avoid uncontrolled autonomous systems.

title: Connor McDavid’s wife Lauren Kyle confirms delay in Sports Club Atelier collection
description: Lauren Kyle, founder of Sports Club Atelier and wife of Connor McDavid, shared an update on her upcoming collaboration with Hockey Canada, confirming a slight delay in the launch. She emphasized the importance of getting every detail right. The collection follows the success of her earlier releases, which blend hockey culture with luxury streetwear.

title: Luke Littler net worth: Tournament winnings, endorsements, and earnings
description: Teenage darts sensation Luke Littler has rapidly risen on the PDC circuit, winning major titles and earning over £2 million in prize money. Backed by lucrative sponsorships, media work, and global brand deals, Littler has become one of the most marketable and financially successful young stars in professional darts.

title: Vanessa Bryant thanks fans for braving rain at emotional Mamba book signing
description: Vanessa Bryant recently hosted a 'Mamba & Mambacita Forever' book signing, drawing large crowds despite rain. The event celebrated Kobe and Gianna Bryant's enduring legacy through art and community. Fans shared personal stories, highlighting how Vanessa's foundation continues to inspire and provide sports opportunities for underserved youth, honoring her family's memory.

title: Ayesha Curry promotes Jamaican tourism after devastating hurricane
description: Ayesha Curry is urging fans to support Jamaica's recovery from Hurricane Melissa by visiting the island. She highlighted that tourism is crucial for the Jamaican economy, with nearly 30% of the workforce dependent on it. Curry emphasized that a vacation serves as a donation, with airports and most hotels now operational.
